title: Test consolidated chezmoi run scripts on remote machine
description:
The run scripts have been consolidated from 9 to 6 files. Test 'chezmoi apply' on a test machine (both macOS and Linux if possible) to verify:
- Package installation works correctly
- Upgrade scripts execute properly
- Framework setup completes successfully
- Remote deployment via setup-chezmoi-remote.sh still works

Files changed:
- Created: run_after_50-install-packages.sh.tmpl (consolidated darwin+linux)
- Created: run_after_60-upgrades.sh.tmpl (consolidated brew+opencode)
- Updated: run_once_after_90-finalize.sh.tmpl (now includes framework setup)
- Deleted: 5 old scripts
